mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM movie_category WHERE category_type_no= #{category_type_no};

SELECT movie_no, name, IF(type='B',"구매","대여") AS type, Floor(price / 100 * (100 - sale)) AS sale, price, thumbnail FROM movie WHERE movie_no IN(select movie_no from movie_category WHERE category_type_no = #{category_type_no});

SELECT movie_no, name, IF(type='B',"구매","대여") AS type, Floor(price / 100 * (100-sale)) as sale, price, thumbnail,release_date FROM movie WHERE movie_no IN(select movie_no from movie_category WHERE category_type_no = #{category_type_no}) ORDER BY release_date desc LIMIT #{limit}, 15;
